<<<<<<< HEAD
The arte of reason, rightly termed, witcraft teaching a perfect way to argue and dispute. Made by Raphe Leuer. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed in the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions. Lever, Ralph, d. 1584.
[24], 233, [7] p.
By H. Bynneman, dwelling in Knightrider streate, at the signe of the Mermayde. Anno. 1573. These bookes are to be solde at his shop at the northvvest dore of Paules church, Imprinted at London : [1573]
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
